relation: Categories
Campus Safety
Clubs and Activities
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
What to do for fun
Food and Dining
Dorm Life
Academic Rigor
Tips for prospective students
In three sentences
Comments

There is a Campus Safety office on campus.. when you move in they recommend to give a list of any valuables that you bring with you on campus.. there are always security driving around. also vanguard is installing campus safety buttons in the parking lots.
There are many clubs and activities, a way for you to get involved and meet tons of new people!!
Can't wait to experience them because i have heard Vanguard has a ton of them!!!

VU has many planned events and the student body becomes very close. I am excited for Welcome week when you become an official Lion. We move into our dorms, have a family picnic, say goodbye to our parents, and then we are off to Downtown Disney!!! Awesome way to start!!! We are also about 3 miles from the beach!! What better to do then hit the beach!!!! :)
I have not tried VU's food yet but i hear it is very good and i have walked past the cafeteria and it smells delicious. The cafeteria has great hours and is open for any meal at any time of the day.

I haven't moved into Vanguard yet but I am excited to meet my roommates and build a friendship with them and the girls on my floor. There are many activities for just the floors, planned by your floor RA.
haven't started classes yet but so excited to meet my new professors
Keep in touch with your Admissions Counselor, they will help you through the whole process.
Can't wait to start my college experience at Vanguard University!!!!
pageTitle: Vanguard University of Southern California Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {11024=You are started off with welcome week in August. This week is just to help you get to know people and the campus and surrounding areas before school even starts. You feel at home within a week. Everybody here treats you like a friend, you cannot walk to class without talking to at least one person on the way! Your floor is your family, and after being here only one semester we all are like sisters! And who doesn't like being 20 minutes from Disneyland???, 211220=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}
